
Simple container
.
:::
*content*
:::
.
*content*
.


Can contain block elements too
.
:::
### heading

-----------
:::
.
### heading

-----------
.


Can contain the ":" charcater
.
:::
This is a list:
* item 1
* item 2
* item 3
:::
.
This is a list:
* item 1
* item 2
* item 3
.


HTML is secure
.
:::
<div>
  <strong>Hello world</strong>
</div>
:::
.
&lt;div&gt;
  &lt;strong&gt;Hello world&lt;/strong&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
.
